snippet.title: Echo: The Oracle's Scroll - Trailer
snippet.description:
Echo: The Oracle's Scroll is a metroidvania without combat, focused on exploration and jumping puzzles.

Coming to the Playdate Catalog on Sept 10th.

Set in a world that is slowly succumbing to a Blight that petrifies everything in it's wake. You will travel through the Kingdoms' Three to deliver a Scroll, that might be our last hope.

- socials
twitter - https://twitter.com/bumbleborn
website - https://scroll.bumbleborn.com/

The dev log unfortunately has taken a back seat to get the game finished but I'll be making several episodes to cover development as soon as the game is finished! The big news is that I missed my birthday haha! I'm close though, and once the game is done I absolutely believe it will be good, but that's for other people to judge really.

#indiegame #playdate #trailer #platformer
